attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Walthamstow Dog Stadium is one of the last remaining in London. Today Walthamstow has the largest attendance and gambling turnover in the UK. It is Walthamstow's one tourist attraction but is threatened by developers. The beautiful 30's facade of the stadium is protected but the rest of the site is not. Please help keep this establishment not only for local people, but as an important national institution.
